t: First-in-a-decade 7UP Packaging Refresh Aligns Offerings with a Modern Twist | Packaging World
s: The central question when refreshing an iconic, longstanding brand design is, 'how much of the baby do we throw out with the bathwater?' Keruig Dr Pepper brand 7UP answered 'none,' instead applying subtle, modern updates to retain a familiar feel.
